entry.title: Wanna incentivize your users? Ini will teach you how!
entry.summary:
Wanna incentivize your users? Ini will teach you how!
Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔷🔹Token Incentives🔹🔷 Most blockchain projects and protocols focus on community building as this is key to product adoption, given that web3 is still novel. To boost community participation and product adoption, incentivizing the community via ''token incentives'' is key. 🧵
